desc.en: Genryumon's executive officer, Mina, is always working hard to maintain safety in Shanhaijing. Her actions set an exemplary standard for others to follow, but there seems to be something unique about her activities.
desc.jp: Genryumon's executive officer, Mina, is always working hard to maintain safety in Shanhaijing. Her actions set an exemplary standard for others to follow, but there seems to be something unique about her activities.
desc.zh_cn: {cn玄龙门}的运行部长{cf美奈}为了维持{sn山海经}的治安，总是不分昼夜地努力。虽然是值得视为模范的行为，但行为本身似乎又反映出某种独特的偏好。

desc.en: Sensei and the group engage in battle with the smugglers responsible for stealing the 10,000-year-old Ginseng.
desc.jp: Sensei and the group engage in battle with the smugglers responsible for stealing the 10,000-year-old Ginseng.
desc.zh_cn: 老师一行人和「万年参外流事件」背后的走私贩展开战斗。

name.en: Dragon & Tortoise, Working Together for a Better Future
name.jp: Dragon & Tortoise, Working Together for a Better Future
name.zh_cn: 龙武同舟～心中描绘的，是同一个{cf未来}～

desc.en: A precarious balance had existed between the Black Tortoise Promenade and Genryumon in Shanhaijing when an incident throws that balance awry.... Will Sensei and the students be able to prevent the situation from plunging into chaos?
desc.jp: A precarious balance had existed between the Black Tortoise Promenade and Genryumon in Shanhaijing when an incident throws that balance awry.... Will Sensei and the students be able to prevent the situation from plunging into chaos?
desc.zh_cn:
重视传统的{cn玄龙门}与尊崇进化的{cn玄武商会}。
彼此相反的{sn山海经}两大派系维持着危险的平衡。
某天，{cn玄武商会}被加诸了莫须有的怀疑──
究竟一行人能否克服这个危机呢？

name.en: Dragon & Tortoise, Working Together for a Better Future
name.jp: Dragon & Tortoise, Working Together for a Better Future
name.zh_cn: 龙武同舟～心中描绘的，是同一个{cf未来}～

desc.en: A precarious balance had existed between the Black Tortoise Promenade and Genryumon in Shanhaijing when an incident throws that balance awry.... Will Sensei and the students be able to prevent the situation from plunging into chaos?
desc.jp: A precarious balance had existed between the Black Tortoise Promenade and Genryumon in Shanhaijing when an incident throws that balance awry.... Will Sensei and the students be able to prevent the situation from plunging into chaos?

究竟一行人能否克服这个危机呢？

desc.en: Sensei and the group successfully subdue the smugglers, but come to realize that they are merely pawns serving the mastermind working behind the scenes.
desc.jp: Sensei and the group successfully subdue the smugglers, but come to realize that they are merely pawns serving the mastermind working behind the scenes.
desc.zh_cn: 老师一行人成功压制住万年参走私贩。不过他们也只是某个人的爪牙而已，也因此揭露了还有另一股实权势力存在的事实。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
